question:
You recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home, you found you had left some important papers at the hotel.
Write a letter to the manager of the hotel. 
In your letter

say where you think you left the papers
explain why they are so important
tell the manager what you want him/her to do
text: I am SuryaTeja. I have recently been to your hotel for a meeting organized by Tech213 last week, i,e june 15th. The event was a huge success and all the services provided by your hotel were excellent. After returning home, I realized that I have left few papers back in the party hall where the event was organized.

These papers are important to me because they contain my degree certificates and other important documents regarding the event. Moreover, those are my original copy of degree certificates, if lost will be difficult and time consuming process to get an copy from the University.

I would like to make a request to search for the documents in the party hall, if found could you please keep it with you safely. I will come and pick the documents personally once they are found. It will be a great help which I cannot forget. You can contact me at [email protected]
I am looking forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: The pronoun I should always be capitalized.
It appears that the word june may be a proper noun in this context. Consider capitalizing the word.
It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It appears that time consuming is missing a hyphen. Consider adding the hyphen(s).
The article an may be incorrect. Consider changing it to agree with the beginning sound of the following word copy.
It seems that there is a pronoun problem here.
